name: Inked
description: Inked is a tale of love and vengeance told in ink on paper. You play as the Nameless Hero who sets out on a journey in a vast landscape filled with puzzles for you to solve. Each puzzle takes you closer to your lost love, unraveling a story that will forever change you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.3 Ghz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 260X or equivalent with at least 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
